```{r}
cond_prob <- function(d1=1,s=2){
  
  if(d1>6 | d1<1) stop('Invalid value for dice!' )
  if(s>12 | s<2) stop('Invalid value for sum of the two independent dice!' )
  
  die <- 1:6
  # sample space of two dice
  rolls <- expand.grid(die, die)
  
  R <- data.frame(rolls, rowSums(rolls))
  colnames(R) <- c("D_1", "D_2", "S")
  
  # calculate the probability that the sum of two dice is Pr(D1=d1 | S=s)
  list(
    sample_space = R[(R$S == s), ],
    prob = sum(R$D_1 == d1 & R$S == s) / sum(R$S == s)   
  )
  
}

```

**Pr(D1=d1 | S=s)**.
